channel.title: Mehrauli murder case on NewsStreet

item.title: Mehrauli murder case: Aftab to be produced in court today
item.description: Mehrauli murder case: Aftab to be produced in court today New Delhi: Aftab Ameen Poonawalla, who has been arrested for allegedly murdering his live-in partner Shraddha Walkar and chopping her body into 35 pieces, will be produced in the Saket Court Thursday.
